languages.text: "Можете на нас рассчитывать, Ваша Светлость! Наш лучший шанс перехватить инициативу — внезапный удар. Человеку, победившему Кровавых прозелитов, не составит труда продержаться на арене достаточно долго, чтобы мы смогли ударить врага в самый неожиданный момент. Удачи, Ваша Светлость. Император защищает!"

traits.locale_text: "Можете на нас рассчитывать, Ваша Светлость! Наш лучший шанс перехватить инициативу — внезапный удар. Человеку, победившему Кровавых прозелитов, не составит труда продержаться на арене достаточно долго, чтобы мы смогли ударить врага в самый неожиданный момент. Удачи, Ваша Светлость. Император защищает!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"
languages.original_text: "Можете на нас рассчитывать, Ваша Светлость! Наш лучший шанс перехватить инициативу — внезапный удар. Император защищает!"

Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「お任せください、陛下！我々が優位に立つための最大のチャンスは、奇襲攻撃を仕掛けることです。陛下は血まみれの改宗者たちに勝利したお方。敵の不意を突いて攻撃できるその日まで、闘技場で生き延びるなど、さほど難しくないはずです。幸運を祈ります、陛下。皇帝のご加護があらんことを！」
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"

traits.locale_text: 「お任せください、陛下！我々が優位に立つための最大のチャンスは、奇襲攻撃を仕掛けることです。陛下は血まみれの改宗者たちに勝利したお方。敵の不意を突いて攻撃できるその日まで、闘技場で生き延びるなど、さほど難しくないはずです。幸運を祈ります、陛下。皇帝のご加護があらんことを！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “交给我们吧，大人！如果想在这场战斗中占上风，最好的办法是突然发动袭击。您战胜了那些血腥叛党，对您而言，在竞技场上努力撑下去应该不是什么困难的事情。我们会在敌人最意想不到的时候发起进攻，击溃他们。祝您好运，大人。愿帝皇保佑您！”
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"

traits.locale_text: “交给我们吧，大人！如果想要掌握这场战斗的主动权，最好的办法是突然发动袭击。您战胜了那些血腥叛党，对您而言，在竞技场上努力撑下去应该不是什么困难的事情。我们会在敌人最意想不到的时候发起进攻，击溃他们。祝您好运，大人。愿帝皇保佑您！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡Puede contar con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Nuestra mejor oportunidad de sacar ventaja es atacarles por sorpresa. Usted triunfó sobre los Prosélitos Ensangrentados; no debería ser un gran problema para usted aguantar el tiempo suficiente en la arena hasta que podamos golpear a nuestro enemigo cuando menos se lo espere. Buena suerte. El Emperador protege».
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Puede contar con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Nuestra mejor oportunidad de tomar la iniciativa es atacarles por sorpresa. Usted es triunfó sobre los Prosélitos Ensangrentados; no debería ser un gran problema para usted aguantar el tiempo suficiente en la arena hasta que podamos golpear a nuestro enemigo cuando menos se lo espere. Buena suerte. El Emperador protege».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ihr könnt auf uns zählen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Am besten können wir die Oberhand gewinnen, indem wir sie mit einem Überraschungsangriff überrumpeln. Ihr seid {mf|der Mann, der|die Frau, die} über die Blutbefleckten Proselyten triumphiert hat. Für Euch sollte es ein Leichtes sein, in der Arena lange genug durchzuhalten, bis wir unseren Feind völlig unerwartet angreifen können. Ich wünsche Euch viel Glück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Imperator schützt uns!"
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt auf uns zählen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Am besten können wir die Initiative an uns reißen, indem wir sie mit einem Überraschungsangriff überrumpeln. Ihr seid {mf|der Mann, der|die Frau, die} über die Blutbefleckten Proselyten triumphiert hat. Für Euch sollte es ein Leichtes sein, in der Arena lange genug durchzuhalten, bis wir unseren Feind völlig unerwartet angreifen können. Ich wünsche Euch viel Glück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Imperator schützt uns!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: « Vous pouvez compter sur nous, Votre Seigneurie ! Si nous voulons prendre le dessus, la meilleure solution reste d'opter pour une attaque-surprise. Vous êtes {mf|celui|celle} qui a triomphé des Prosélytes sanglants, vous ne devriez donc avoir aucun mal à tenir bon dans l'arène jusqu'à ce qu'il soit temps pour nous de frapper. Bonne chance, Votre Seigneurie. L'Empereur protège ! »
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez compter sur nous, Votre Seigneurie ! Si nous voulons prendre l'initiative, la meilleure solution reste d'opter pour une attaque-surprise. Vous êtes {mf|celui|celle} qui a triomphé des Prosélytes Entachés de sang, vous ne devriez donc avoir aucun mal à tenir bon dans l'arène jusqu'à ce que le moment vienne pour nous de frapper. Bonne chance, Votre Seigneurie. L'Empereur protège ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Bize güvenebilirsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Avantaj kazanmak için elimizdeki en iyi fırsat, onları gafil avlamak. Sonuçta siz, Kızıl Zındıklar'ı bozguna uğratan {mf|adamsınız|kadınsınız}... Düşmanlarımıza hiç beklemedikleri bir anda baskın düzenleyebilmemiz için arenada yeterince uzun süre ayakta kalmakta zorlanmazsınız. Bol şans dileriz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator korur!"
languages.original_text: "You can count on us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Our best chance of gaining the upper hand is to hit them with a surprise attack. You are the {mf|man|woman} who triumphed over the Bloodstained Proselytes — it shouldn't be much of a challenge for you to last long enough in the arena until we can strike our enemy when they least expect it. Good luck to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Emperor protects!"
